column1: Act Like a Leader, Think Like a Leader,হার্মেনিয়া আইবারা,"","TK. 2,070",https://rokomari.com//book/132060/act-like-a-leader--think-like-a-leader,https://ds.rokomari.store/rokomari110/ProductNew20190903/130X186/0b1c31aa5484_132060.jpg,"","Act Like a Leader,Think Like a Leader",Herminia Ibarra, , ,Narosa,9781422184127,"1st Edition,2015",222,India,English

Modern Physics ,অলকা সাক্সেনা ,"","TK. 1,160",https://rokomari.com//book/54785/modern-physics,https://ds.rokomari.store/rokomari110/ProductNew20190903/130X186/rokimg_2111_54785.gif,"Book Summary of Principles of Modern Physics

Principles of Modern Physics, divided into nineteen chapters, begins with quantum ideas followed by discussions on special relativity, atomic structure and basic quantum mechanics, hydrogen atom (solution of the Schrödinger equation) and periodic table, the three statistical distributions, X-rays, physics of solids, imperfections in crystals, magnetic properties of materials, superconductivity, Zeeman-, Stark- and Paschen Back effects and Lasers, nuclear physics (Yukawa’s theory and various nuclear models) radioactivity and nuclear reactions, nuclear fusion, fission and plasma, particle accelerators and detectors, the universe elementary particles (classification, eightfold way and quark model, standard model, fundamental interactions) and cosmic rays.

column2: Classification of galaxies, CMBR and dark matter
Hubble’s constant and the future of the universe
Cosmic ray showers (types and cascade theory)
Nature and composition and origin of cosmic rays
Effect of geomagnetic field and time variation of cosmic rays.
Offers students a conceptual development of basic principles of modern physics.
Mathematical steps provided to elucidate physical concepts.
Examples given for a better understanding of the subject.
Interaction of Atoms with External Fields and Radiation
Accelerators and Detectors of Elementary Particles
